name: Overdrive (itch) (jsquad151)
description:
Discovering, indulging, running from, accepting and overcoming addiction.

These are the difficulties that the player will go through when playing this game. Overdrive is a game that explores drug addiction and how it can affect the work life. As the player delves deeper into the game, they will be faced with choices that can change the outcome and experience that each player has.

Please note.

This game has plenty that can still be done to it. This was a group assignment for Vega CPT as part of a Game Design degree and our full vision for the game is yet to be reached.
